website_summaries.verdict: Not ideal for all cats, but it's the hands-down best pick from Fancy Feast for kittens and their mothers.
pros: With its combination of essential nutrients, real milk, and tender texture, it is an ideal recipe for kittens and nursing mother cats
Ocean whitefish flavor – a feline favorite
cons: A few reports of digestive upset
Some kittens aren't interested in eating it

customer_reviews.title: Worms
customer_reviews.text: Be careful!! I found worms in my last batch of canned food. Thankfully, I was smushing the food around to divvy it up among my kittens since they need to be fed separately which is when I saw it. I still need to feed this brand to my foster kittens (because of our shelter guidelines) but I will inspect the food from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for a litter of kittens since I started weaning them but recently I got a batch that left the remaining kitten (that wasn't adopted) extremely ill! I opened the can and thought the color looked off but chalked it up to being overly concerned, should have trusted my gut. Kitty ended up needing antibiotics and fluids but is back to her happy self after a few days of meds and complete change of food. Quality control is off, after research it's the same brand that makes Apollo which made one of my dogs sick a few years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: My kittens loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Tender Turkey Feast for Kittens and my 2 month old kitten loves it! This comes in a pack of 24 cans, the size of your palm. It smells like spam and has a mushy, brown texture. For cautionary notice- make sure to put in a plastic container and refrigerate if there's leftover. If you leave it out for more than 30min., the food oxidizes and grows bacteria which can be hazardous to your cat! (I accidentally left it out overnight and my kitten had diarrhea)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kind of like how I get when I hear someone else open ...
customer_reviews.text: Kitten tested, kitten approved! It's hard to find wet food specifically for kittens, but he loves this stuff. He won't leave me alone when it's time to eat. As soon as he hears the can lid crack open, he starts freaking out...kind of like how I get when I hear someone else open up a beer can near me. I'm confused on why the turkey is so expensive though...$30 when the ocean whitefish is $13? Wish there was a half and half variety pack but either way, he loves it so we'll keep feeding it to him.
customer_reviews.author: Cordero Roman

customer_reviews.title: Kittens like it.
customer_reviews.text: They love it. Then again, they love any wet food. I give two cans a day between the two of them to supplement their hard food. It’s especially important for male cats to have wet food, to help prevent urinary crystals (it’s the needed ash content in the food).
customer_reviews.author: bkwrm

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up 🐾
customer_reviews.text: I have a geriatric cat who is very finicky. She loves fancy feast kitten food. Since she’s been eating it her coat has become glossy again and she looks healthier in general. She has even started playing more!
customer_reviews.author: kendy murphy

customer_reviews.title: I am writing this review and including my pictures~~~Gypsy
customer_reviews.text: Meow Meow Meow My Owner is letting me write this review with my paws. Meow. She needs to give this to me more often. Meow. Makers of Fancy Feast kidnap me. Meow. I love this stuff. Its Meowlicious!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heyoka

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kittens and Mother Cats
customer_reviews.text: I used this canned food to feed foster kittens from the animal shelter. This canned food was great for supplementing the kittens and the mother cat since canned food is 78% water. This is important as many cats don't drink as much water as they should. This food is super easy to eat and chew for kittens who have not yet developed all of their teeth. I also used it was a tasty reward for teaching the kitten good manners and acceptable behavior so they could be adopted out.
customer_reviews.author: SiamicTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beware Gas and Bloat!
customer_reviews.text: CONTAINS DAIRY. I didn't realize this before I bought it. It gave my poor kitten the WORST gas and bloating I've experienced from a cat! Her tiny belly swelled up so it was rock hard and it looked like she'd swallowed a softball. To be fair, my adult cat ate a couple of the left over cans (after I switched the poor kitten's food!) and she didn't have horrible gas, so I think my kitten is extra sensitive, but cats should never be given dairy! I'm disappointed in a brand I've used and trusted for years!
customer_reviews.author: Sv

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens starting to eat solid food!
customer_reviews.text: When I found an abandoned kitten this fall I decided to try this Fancy Feast kitten food when he was ready for solid food. My adult cats eat Fancy Feast and like it, and the kitten did like this formula. It is formulated for a kitten's needs and is a nice soft pate. When the kitten was shifting from formula to solid food I started mixing a little of this kitten food in with the formula to get him used to the taste and it worked really well. Now he eats like a little horse!
customer_reviews.author: CG Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Some cans have a good smell but some the cats refuse.
customer_reviews.text: I have cats who need extra nutrition. I mix some with their adult cat food. The consistency is dry and won't smash well. My cats prefer non lumpy food. It is too dry and hard to get the lumps smashed. Very dissatisfied with the inconsistency of flavor and smell. No grain cat food should smell like fish. Fukashema has messed up Tuna and Salmon fishing in the North Pacific . The fish are dying out and radiation is high. My guess is the company is trying to find a safe source for fish with lots of flavor. 9 hungry cats refuse it when they smell no fish and taste no fish and a lot gets wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Caused chin acne on two cats
customer_reviews.text: I got a new kitten, and already had two adult cats. I couldn't keep the adults eating their normal gravy wet food as the kitten would sneak and eat that and get the runs. So instead I switched the adults to this kitten pate. Within a week they both developed severe chin acne. The kitten seems unaffected but his fur is way longer than the adult cats. So I have no idea what is in this food, I only know that it gave my adult cats chin acne. Nothing else changed in their diet or environment and they eat out of porcelain/metal bowls so plastic bowl is definitely not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Doina "Day" Berndt dba Kalyana Design

customer_reviews.title: Kitten didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Due to the high reviews I bought a 24 pack and my kitten won't eat it. She will like the juice off, but even though she eats most things ravenously like she's never seen food before, she leaves most of this behind. Really wish I hadn't bought a 24 pack of it. It seems like a dry puck with a little bit of liquid sitting in the bottom of the can. Perhaps we got an old batch.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Grain free and (evidently) yummy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few grain-free wet foods for kittens that doesn’t cost an arm and a leg.....and that our kitten scarfs down. (He turned his nose up at the very expensive well known grain-free brand). He loves his Fancy Feast and I love the price and the fact that the case offers six of each flavor. He has his favorites but eats them all. (I suggest checking that out by buying a can of each at a local store first.). At five months, Toby generally polishes off 1/3 can twice a day. Buy a lid for the leftovers at any store that sells canned pet food.
customer_reviews.author: stonegarden

customer_reviews.title: Cat is sick
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves fancy feast and I buy the cans individually in the store. This time i ordered these offline and a week has gone by. He throws up Everytime after he eats. ): It must be the food that these cans ordered offline are not the same as in store. I don't know what else it could be because nothing else has changed.
customer_reviews.author: mille829

customer_reviews.title: Seems great
customer_reviews.text: I've never actually given this to my cats (All adults or teens when I got them). But I order it frequently for our animal shelter because they are always overrun with kittens. When the shelter asks for donations, this is always on their list. They always request this brand. I hope this feeds your kitties as well as it does the ones still looking for homes!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: New flavor
customer_reviews.text: They ate this as if they never ate before. Even let the little stray outside have some. She was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie V. Galasso

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves this stuff. In fact, he likes this over all sorts of other wet and dry food. My vet says he should be eating dry food, but he turns his nose at pretty much all dry food. I have tried other more expensive wet food and kitten Emmi takes a hard pass. The cool thing about these portions is that I can take a tablespoon of it at a time and a can is good for several small snacks over a day. Putting out a single full can in a dish is too much.
customer_reviews.author: desertchica

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loved.
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loved this stuff. It do smell a bit fishy but not too overpowering. My older cat who would never eat wet food suddenly wanted to eat the kittens food. Not sure if he liked it or was jealous of kitten. Lol. The kittens stool went from loose to firm when I started feeding him this product.
customer_reviews.author: D Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love this cat food
customer_reviews.text: This is the best value of wet kitten food I've found, both in store and online. Inexpensive, but good quality nutrition for my growing kitten. I buy the variety packs of this stuff in bulk, and it's the same price or cheaper than other online pet stores, and cheaper than pet stores I've visited in person.
customer_reviews.author: medici28

customer_reviews.title: Horrible 👎🏼😾👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: thought this would be good because I purchase other food from this brand but unfortunately this one made my cat throw up and have severe diarrhea I don’t recommend this at all . Amazon should really look into this and I really wouldn’t allow this to be on the website because it could be hazardous for your kitten or cat . Very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: RnG

customer_reviews.title: My cats said “Eat it yourself.”
customer_reviews.text: Cans are 3 oz. I feed two Ragdolls each 1 can per day. My cats refused to eat this kitten food! They like fancy feast adult food and am sticking with what works The kittens (now 6 months & 10 months are thriving. I am not concerned about extra vitamins for them. Cat food is nearly impossible to review. 3 oz of FF is 3 oz. your kitten may love it.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Connor

customer_reviews.title: Worms in the package
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the turkey one for my foster kittens a few times and there was no issue, the food itself works very well. However, the recent order I made, when the package came in, the package was filled with tiny white worms and tiny flies and some dead dried up worms. It was the most disgusting scene. I immediately bagged the entire box along with other items in the package and throw them away. Fortunately with Amazons great customer service, I got a full refund, but it makes me so paranoid with future orders especially I have a phobia for bugs. Just be aware and make sure you check the package thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Jingru Wang

customer_reviews.title: Kittens devour this food
customer_reviews.text: My nine month old kittens still love this and even the adults want it. When they were younger, I used this to wean them by slowly adding some to kitten milk replacer (KMR) over the course of 1 1/2 weeks until only this food was served in the bowls. Weaning was easy and none of the kittens had any issues adjusting on this food. They get some adult wet food now, but this is still their favorite. I wouldn’t be surprised if they protest after they hit the twelve month mark and switch to only adult food. Might need to make this a special treat every now and then when that time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie W.

customer_reviews.title: Smelly but kitten loves it
customer_reviews.text: Good for my kitten and my kitten loves it (as do my 2 adult cats that keep stealing bites) but dear god this has such a strong scent! It gives my whole house a fishy smell. I have been buying Fancy Feast for years now (for adult cats) and none of their other canned or dry food have such a strong scent.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: This food gave my 7-month-old kitten diarrhea. I'm guessing the milk in the ingredients is to blame as I found out cats are lactose intolerant once they are weaned (stop drinking mom's milk). The only convenience of this product is that it's a canned item with a 3 0z portion size which is about how much my boy eats per meal. But I ended up having to return this after 2 cans. Beware of that when considering this food for your kitty. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sidrat N.

customer_reviews.title: KITTENS ARE HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: All I can tell you is that the 3 baby kittens entrusted to our care are now getting bigger, they PREFER the kitten Fancy Feast, they are healthy and growing. I don't know what is in this kitten food but my little ones chow down without any help. A definite BUY if you have baby kittens.
customer_reviews.author: Cardione1Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find good wet kitten food
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find good wet kitten food. It may not be the best, but my two little guys love it--both kinds.
customer_reviews.author: M  Broyhill

customer_reviews.title: Finicky Senior Cat Refused To Eat This
customer_reviews.text: I have a very finicky senior cat that needs to put on a little weight. He’s 14 years old and always liked Fancy Feast chicken or turkey flavors. I thought I might entice him to eat some kitten formula. He smelled it and then walked away. Opened another can the next day and again, he just walked away.
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with first purchase from here of her canned food
customer_reviews.text: my kitten loves it...it arrived in perfect condition...doesn't expire til summer of 2022...I buy it despite my reservations about the milk in it...I never feel that should be put in reviews...it's on the ingredients list afterall...I chuckle when I see such reviews...as long as the price is fairly decent on here then I will order from here
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Turkey and Fish! Not just turkey!
customer_reviews.text: Why do they add FISH? My cat vomits when she eats FISH. She now turns her nose and walks away from this. She figured out that it makes her sick. Purina please sell what you advertise--Turkey, not FISH!
customer_reviews.author: LadyBlue

customer_reviews.title: My Kittens Love Fancy Feast!
customer_reviews.text: My kittens absolutely lose their little kitty minds over their Fancy Feast Wet Kitten Food! They're normally not very vocal, but they will express their excitement while they're waiting for their food dish to land in its spot! Yummy, yummy in their little kitty tummies!!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast Kitten Pate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14 year old cat who doesn't want to eat at times. Hoping it would revive her appetite. She ate it for a few days then got finicky and stopped. My other, 4 year old would eat it all day if she I would open the cans for her. But, that's cats!
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Cleared up tummy issues for my kittens!
customer_reviews.text: I have two, 10 week old kittens and I started them on Wellness, which is double the price. It did NOT agree with one of their stomachs, and they both seemed less than thrilled to be eating it to begin with. I made the switch to Fancy Feast kitten and the GI issues have resolved and they seem to love this food much better. I will not spend the crazy money on another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Kittens love this food, unfortanely so does everyone else. Cannot keep the rest of the cats out of the kitten food! Its also rather pricey.
customer_reviews.author: yaya

customer_reviews.title: Happy kitty =happy human kitty mommie
customer_reviews.text: About 7 weeks ago I became the proud, adoptive mommie of a day old kitten. He took readily to his formula, KMR, but was reluctant to try ANY cat food. I tried mixing the formula with food but he refused. I read about Fancy Feast kitten food but could only find on Amazon. He ate it the first time I offered it. He was 5 weeks old. At first I mixed it with KMR formula to coax him to eat. He loves it and quickly gave up his beloved bottle. I bought the turkey Fancy Feast. I would recommend it and give it 5 paws up.
customer_reviews.author: suzyq

customer_reviews.title: Kitty food!
customer_reviews.text: Since I haven't had the product myself all I can note on it is that my kitten wakes me up in the morning and follows me around meowing and meowing until it is time for her to get her wet food. This is the only wet food she has tried so I guess it must taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Not to My Cats' Tastes
customer_reviews.text: The cats are not loving it. I am not sure why. They love Fancy Feast, but neither the kitten nor the senior cat eat more than a couple of mouthfuls without walking away.
customer_reviews.author: Suze Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Meat first and a little bit is good.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this type for kittens I Foster and my adult cats. The first ingredient is meat. Then I mix water with the can when the kittens are just trying "solid" food. Next I mix dry and water. I add water to my adult cats canned or dry food once a day. Felines tend to not drink enough. Blockage means a trip to the vet. Hydrate all felines. So my canned cat food is fresh and meat is the first ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Most Affordable Kitten Wet Food
customer_reviews.text: I foster kittens and use this food a lot. Sometimes for little ones, it is hard on their tummies or the babies don’t want to eat it. It isn’t the best choice for weaning. But for older kittens, it’s the most affordable option And they usually love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good value, cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat seems to love it. Wish the can was a tiny bit bigger as he’s such a hungry boy but probably the appropriate portion size. These are a good price, any cheaper and the food seems to give him tummy trouble. I had got a good deal on some other food and couldn’t wait to switch back to fancy feast after he finished those up because his stool was quite gross from that brand.
customer_reviews.author: Babette Norrell

customer_reviews.title: My cats are very finicky.
customer_reviews.text: They do seem to like the turkey in gravy more often than other cat food. I have had better luck with fancy feast than any of them. They are picky though and know I will feed them something else if they don't eat, so sometimes it is a miss but most they eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Valhalla

customer_reviews.title: My cats & kittens love this one
customer_reviews.text: My momma cat and her kittens love this one so I continue to buy it. It can get costly but since my cat gave birth she's got super skinny and this has helped her gain a little back. I hope the price doesn't go up because I'll have to look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Deanna F.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This gave my kitten the worst case of diarrhea! Upon looking at the ingredients I noticed this had milk in it which is the worst thing you can do!! Cats are known to be lactose intolerant so I don't understand why you would put milk as the ingredients and milk isn't even good for cats!
customer_reviews.author: UnknownFish

customer_reviews.title: Makes my kitty throw up
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves the taste of this but sadly it always makes her throw up. Not Amazons fault, but I did read other reviews stating the same problem. Maybe your kitty has a strong stomach, mine sure doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Howard

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have been giving this canned food to our five kittens twice a day in addition to dry food available to them all the time. They love the food and have grown significantly. We were slightly concerned about it upsetting their stomachs since they were rescued, but we have had no issues. We are also pleased about the price relative to the quality.I would recommend this to anyone with kittens!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for kittens
customer_reviews.text: My cats quickly ate up both the chicken and salmon flavors. Wonderful to find Fancy Feast KITTEN in other flavors. I think they were bored. Salmon doesn’t smell as badly as the Ocean Whitefish. Great price with discount. Arrived with no dented cans too. Great box for storing cans.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Kitten food - fancy feast
customer_reviews.text: A decent price for “kitten” forumla food which is difficult to find in the stores
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Kitten loves this food! Unlike other food, this does his stomach well, he has firmer stools and after eating this, he no longer has diarrhea. I mix this up with kitten chow, and my kitten absolutely goes crazy for it! He gets so impatient and excited when I start to prepare his food. Very high quality and amazing price for 24 cans, really recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Griselda CoxTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: bit pricey, but cats
customer_reviews.text: bought this pack because the usual 24 pack of fancy feast i get was not available. that pack is about same price as this and has 4 different flavors. would only buy if necessary but my kitten likes it so thats all that matters
customer_reviews.author: S-K

customer_reviews.title: Finally! :)
customer_reviews.text: Both my kitties love these! We’re so happy that they finally came out with new flavors :)
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Stuff is awesome. Our kittens go mental over this stuff twice ...
customer_reviews.text: Stuff is awesome. Our kittens go mental over this stuff twice a day. Have to spread bowls far apart so they don't fight. Dry food out all day and they don't care about it. The kittens love each other but love this stuff more. I am tempted to try it. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Atlantic Capital

customer_reviews.title: can could be bigger but my kittens love this food.
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 healthy happy kittens and they have been eating this since we rescued them...they are very healthy, happy and playful. I would like to see the can a bit larger for the price but we do like this food.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Limehouse

customer_reviews.title: My kittens love this, as well as the momma cat
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love this, as well as the momma cat. I ran out and had to feed my newly weened kittens some other brand adult soft food and it didn't set well with a few of the kittens tummies. I added water to it when they first started eating it to help with moisture/fluid, and because they were just coming off milk. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: G L B

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love it
customer_reviews.text: I keep a couple cases on hand for my orphan foster kittens. Weaning from the bottle to canned mush is easy with this because it must taste pretty good..... it smells pretty good! Have bought this for years
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: My Kitten Does not Like it Anymore
customer_reviews.text: My newly-adopted kitten that I had found him back in December 2019, does not like it anymore. I have no idea why. He used to gorging this one. I can't come to any closure either the flavor has been changed or he just not into it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Widi Widiya

customer_reviews.title: Save time and money
customer_reviews.text: I put five stars for the flavor, but I really don't know what it taste like🤦🏻‍♀️🤣. But the kittens seemed to love it 😻 My daughter fostered a pregnant Mama cat, then the kittens So it was great for the price, & Convience to have all that food delivered
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Kitten Loves It!!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves these little cans. You really do get them for a great price, he is currently 7 months old and every time he hears a can open he freaks out and tries to eat the can. I fed him more wet food when he was younger but now that he is 7 months i split the cans into two meals. The only thins is the Ocean Whitefish does make his breath smell a little funky.
customer_reviews.author: Keara

customer_reviews.title: My 4 month old kitten loves this
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old kitten loves this stuff. I give her 1/2 can in the morning than the other half at night. After the first few days of feeding this to her she comes bolting into the kitchen at the sound of cracking open the can and immediately starts rubbing figure 8's between my legs until I put it into her bowl. Just ordered theand will review that one after seeing how she reacts to it. The only negative I have for this is it does make her breath smell a bit, but I ordered someto see if that helps. Will update after I receive them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse M. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Quantity
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I am giving this 3 stars is because it says 24 -3 oz cans and I only received 12. I put in 3 orders (each order a different flavor) and only received 12 of each instead of 24 of each.....
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: The kittens LOVE this food. I have one kitten who doesn't like dry salmon flavored kibble, but he absolutely loves this. Even my adult cat tries to eat this if the kittens don't eat it all.
customer_reviews.author: N. Little

customer_reviews.title: great for senior cat
customer_reviews.text: my senior cat needs a little more fat in his diet. he loves this and seems to be giving him some extra weight. He is going to be 14 years old, and hoping this keeps him happy for the next few years.
customer_reviews.author: AFruitFli

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great and good value.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this one as well as the turkey one. He is older and my vet said "we need to get calories into him" When I tried this food, he began eating and asking for several cans a day. Yeah.
customer_reviews.author: K Finlay

customer_reviews.title: We tried different foods and found that he will eat (more like gulp) this brand of kitten food
customer_reviews.text: Two cats who are very picky eaters, but different types of picky. The older cat as he ages is losing weight and skips many meals. The vet suggested putting him back on kitten food. We tried different foods and found that he will eat (more like gulp) this brand of kitten food. He loves it and its helping him get back into better health. Not just for kittens, this is great for very old cats that have stopped eating normal food. Very soft and easy to digest and quite tasty I assume as his gulps it down.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: My cat can digest this!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat who has IBS. He is an adult but NEEDS to eat Whitefish food or he will become very ill. He began to loose weight and our vet prescribed 4-5 cans of 3oz food a day for him until he can gain back some bulk. This food is not only something he can digest but he keeps it down and has also put on a little weight in the last few weeks. We give him 1 can of this a day along with his other prescribed diet. He loves this food and we are VERY glad Fancy Feast makes this product.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaKay

customer_reviews.title: Wish this product is safer for cat
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love this product but I was told this (Fancy Feast) is not recommended by our vet. I checked the label and saw it contains artificial color and flavor. I also noticed my kittens stopped having diarrhea after stop feeding this (I went to vet for this matter but they didn’t find any problems). Probably the milk contained in this product was causing diarrhea as most other brands’ wet food doesn’t contain milk.
customer_reviews.author: AI

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love the chicken and hate the salmon
customer_reviews.text: My kittens devoured the chicken but would not touch the salmon. It was the first time introducing them to salmon so perhaps they were just unused to it, but still, I was surprised since my previous cats all loved salmon. I've now just stuck with the chicken and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These kittens loved it. They wolfed down this food faster than ...
customer_reviews.text: I foster kittens for our local animal shelter until they are large enough to be adopted. I usually feed them Fancy Feast Turkey flavor. This wasn't available for prime, so I opted for the ocean whitefish kitten food. It didn't hurt that it was half the price of the turkey too. These kittens loved it. They wolfed down this food faster than they've eaten any of the foods I've tried. I haven't delved into it's nutrition, so I'm hoping it's good for them, because they will fatten up fast with this.
customer_reviews.author: chaparral

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product on a Friday and it arrived the next day! Completely happy with the fast service! I compared prices of amazon and the local pet store and it was so same price. The good part though, I didn’t even have to leave my home to purchase the product. Note, these are the mini cans but it works perfectly fine for my kitten. Great serving size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Donation
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to be donated to the SPCA of Tompkins County in response to their call to support kitten season at the shelter. It was the type and flavor requested to maintain continuity in care and feeding of the babies. The shelter has been no kill for years, so every little bit helps to aid them in carrying out their mission.
customer_reviews.author: Spyderflash13

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love this food. They can’t wait until it’s time to eat. I’ve gotten a couple of shipments now and haven’t had any damaged cans or any other issues so I’ll continue ordering from amazon for now.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bit much for one cat at one sitting, but I have two so I split one between them. On the other hand, its the perfect portion for me when I get a little hungry between lunch and dinner and just want a light snack that won't give me diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Johnson

customer_reviews.title: my cat likes it
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my little old lady kitty. She gets pretty skinny in the summer so I have to encourage her to eat more. This has more calories than her normal kibble which helps her maintain a healthy weight
customer_reviews.author: Buff

customer_reviews.title: Gave my kittens diarrhea, the adult version doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: I guess it could be due to the milk or egg product.
customer_reviews.author: Oukiolopiko

customer_reviews.title: More cost effective options exist
customer_reviews.text: Nutritionally no different than large cans of adult Friskies pate varieties. And because kittens eat a lot, it doesn't take long before they need adult sized cans anyway
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy a case until you know your kitten can handle it
customer_reviews.text: I will say that my kitten went wild for this, but it goes right through him and makes a smelly and messy exit. I will be donating the rest to a shelter. Before you buy a whole case, buy a few cans to make sure your cat can deal with the milk.
customer_reviews.author: LC9919Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 19 year old cats refuses to eat anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Appealing
customer_reviews.text: My female rescue cat was a bit thin when she came to live with us. This kitten food is packed with the nourishment she needs to get to a healthy weight. Her fur is soft and shiny, and she is a very happy girl who loves her food. I've set up monthly shipments for her.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hillyer

customer_reviews.title: mmm...
customer_reviews.text: honestly, not the best kitten wet food out there....I don't like feeding my cats this and I can't say they love it...they don't rush to it and devour it like others, but certainly eat it yes....you should pass unless you're a cat owner on a budget
customer_reviews.author: Emilio’s Roommates

customer_reviews.title: Great for transitioning bottle kittens
customer_reviews.text: I fostered 6 different litters of orphaned kittens over the course of the summer. This wet food blends really with kitten formula to make a “smoothie” The scent is mild enough that they still take the bottle without hesitation. It’s a great transition food and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Local raw food supplier closed down for a remodel with out notice. Not wanting to feed dry food I tried this food in the interim I decided to try this food after reading the reviews. She totally loves it and scarfs it down.
customer_reviews.author: SnR811

customer_reviews.title: Kitten ate it well for a year it did a good job
customer_reviews.text: Kitten ate it for a year. she's doing great now at 2 years old and big as a house and just on regular Purina indoor advantage dry hard indoor cat food
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New kitten is not a fan of this flavor
customer_reviews.text: New kitten doesn't particularly love this flavor, ocean whitefish. I think he got bored with it. Next time I would order a multi-flavor pack. The ingredients in Fancy Feast seem better and healthier than most other low to mid-priced canned cat foods, though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great product for kittens always stick with chicken
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for keeping these in stock as a rescue owner this is very “essential” We are also approaching kitten season so we will need lots!
customer_reviews.author: Laurene Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not the right food for our Kitten
customer_reviews.text: Our kitten typically eats royal canin kitten and purina pro plan. We were trying to find a less costly alternative but, this isn’t it. After one meal he threw up — something that he has never done after eating. Guess it’s just not the right fit for him.
customer_reviews.author: scott thomas

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves this! But too much & she begins smelling unladylike, so we use a little with water to make a gravy & we’re all happy
customer_reviews.author: T. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Salmon Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because the product is good. I was salmon like I ordered but the cans were mislabeled. The labels said chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to feed some abandoned kittens that were just learning to eat soft food. The nutritious food helped them a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Wells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for our Cat Shelter in town. They use this and it is easy to order and have it sent to them. They appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: P. DeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great value and Kitty says delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly as described and shipped free and fast. Our kitten LOVES this food and gives us dirty looks if his dry food doesn't have a dollop of this wet food. Very pleased and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lakehouseplayer

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for this cat food at Walmart, and they only had one can left. I searched on Amazon and found this case. When you break it down, each can was only a few cents more than I would have paid at Walmart. I am very happy with the purchase. And my kittens love it!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Rescue kittens love it.
customer_reviews.text: I foster kitties so at times I get very young kittens and I trust Purina Fancy Feast Tender for the kittens I foster. It has a smooth texture. If my Senior rescue cat is having troubles keeping on weight I will boost his feed with this also.
customer_reviews.author: Khat

customer_reviews.title: Kitten favorite...
customer_reviews.text: Peanut, our kitten, loves this flavor over all the other kitten offerings by Fancy Feast. He will eat the others but this one is eaten with gusto.
customer_reviews.author: Sedonartist

customer_reviews.title: Kitten Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My two kittens absolutely love this food! After transitioning from kitten formula this was the first wet food we tried and they go crazy for it!
customer_reviews.author: AAvcxv

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good way to try the different varieties. It wasn’t always easy to entice tuxx My kitty, to switch from one flavor to another. But I was able to determine that white fish is his favorite
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I tend to use this food for cats recovering from an illness. It seems that most cannot resist the taste. If necessary, it can be placed in a tall glass with a little extra water and blended (with single beater) into a paste suitable for use in a feeding syringe. Great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Darling

customer_reviews.title: Kitten and Cats Love It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kitten to try and keep her from eating the adult's food. The first few days, she didn't eat it, my adult cat did. She eventually started to eat half the can (which is about normal for my kitten), just for one and/or both of my adult cats to finish it. One of my adults actually preferred the kitten food to her cat food. So it turned out to be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great access to a fine product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent food for very young kittens; sometimes hard to find locally in the quantities and prices needed for a non-profit cattery where money is tight and there are lots of kittens needing reliable nourishment. Amazon's price is good; product is available in quantity; delivery was fast and predictable, very important in a situation where a rescue kitten population can double seemingly overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Betti VanEpps-Taylor

customer_reviews.title: yum!
customer_reviews.text: I foster for a local rescue and always try to serve the kittens a good kitten food..... they love this stuff! There are never leftovers and there have been no stomach issues.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Great food, but man it STINKS
customer_reviews.text: My cat has Type-1 Diabetes so her vet recommended we give her kitten food. She's been a really big fan of this variety. However, this stuff stinks to high-heaven. I live in a small apartment and when I feed her the whole apartment smells in a matter of minutes. Not to mention that it makes her...ahem...waste...smell really awful. I do recommend this food as it's reasonably priced and seems to be really nutritional, but while you're adding this to your cart it might be a good idea to seek out a nice air freshener too.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon P.

product_meta.title: Purina Fancy Feast Kitten Canned Wet Cat Food
product_meta.description: Style:Classic Pate| Color:DAA| Size:(24) 3 oz. CansStart your kitten's love of gourmet foods early with Purina Fancy Feast Kitten Tender Ocean Whitefish Feast wet cat food. The tender ocean whitefish gives her the delicate seafood taste cats crave, and the smooth texture makes it easy for her to nibble her way through mealtime. The high-quality kitten formula ingredients give you peace of mind that she's getting the nourishment she needs as she grows, and the essential vitamins and minerals in each serving help to support her overall health and wellness. Watch her little face light up when she hears you open a can of this gourmet kitten food. This delectable soft cat food recipe is made just for her, giving you a way to make her feel special every time you fill her dish. Make mealtime an exciting adventure by offering her our Fancy Feast Kitten Tender Turkey Feast and let her explore the savory taste of poultry. For a variety your feline craves and the convenience you desire, buy Purina Fancy Feast wet cat food from Amazon.
feature_bullets: Sold as "3 oz Cans (Pack of 24)" i.e. 3 oz per can - Purina Fancy Feast Tender Ocean Whitefish Feast Wet Kitten Food
100% Complete And Balanced Nutrition For Kittens
Essential Vitamins And Minerals To Support Her Health

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
